snippet: In New Hampshire, Rick Santorum continues to compare gay marriage with things that have nothing to do with gay marriage.
abstract: In New Hampshire, Rick Santorum continues to compare gay marriage with things that have nothing to do with gay marriage.
lead_paragraph: MANCHESTER, N.H. - There's more news from the equal rights front - some good, some just bizarre.

headline.main: New Jersey Reconsiders Same-Sex Marriage; Santorum Worries About Polygamy
